summary: Implements a FastAPI router that forwards incoming HTTP requests to Google Vertex AI services, handling environment configuration, URL construction, authentication, secret management, and exception translation while integrating with Litellm's logging and fineâ€‘tuning utilities.
business_intent: Expose Vertex AI model endpoints through a unified Litellm proxy, simplifying client access, credential handling, and error management for seamless integration of Vertex AI capabilities within Litellm-powered applications.
